name: fipe-api
description: API de busca de ve√≠culos na tabela FIPE

scripts.start: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev -r dotenv/config --respawn --transpile-only src/index.ts
scripts.startHom: npx cross-env node-options=--env-file=.env NODE_ENV=homologation ts-node-dev -r dotenv/config src/index.ts
scripts.startProd: npx cross-env node-options=--env-file=.env NODE_ENV=production ts-node -r dotenv/config src/index.ts
